Row.Text: We have received word that the leader of {1_CityName} has been quoted from a private meeting as having said some rather foul things about us, remarking that we "look like a llama who has just been surprised in her bath". This kind of slander could sour relationship with {1_CityName}, so we should take this matter very seriously.[NEWLINE]
We won't take this garbage lying down!
We have responded unkindly to the slander coming out of {1_CityName}.
We have decided to brush aside {1_CityName}'s slander, which has left their people quite impressed.
A diplomatic faux pas has occured between Charles de Gaulle of France and the City-State of {1_CityName}.

A bitter scandal has broken out over the recent conviction of Captain Alfred Dreyfus, a Jewish officer sentenced to life in prison for alleged crimes of treason and espionage. Evidence suggesting that Dreyfus' conviction was both false and driven by anti-semitism has divided the French people, and there are those that accuse the military of suppresing his alleged innocence. Pressure has been put on our government to act upon this matter.[NEWLINE]
Dreyfus will live out his sentence.
